website_summaries.verdict: Set comes with 16 mini bottles of gel shades as well as base and top coats. Fashionable, high-pigment color.
pros: Color selection is versatile enough to include a balance of classic shades and edgy ones
Colors are displayed on bottles and tend to be accurate
Packaging is nice enough to give the set as a gift
cons: Mini as opposed to full-size bottles
Some colors may last longer on nails than others

customer_reviews.title: Amazing assortment of Nail Polish
customer_reviews.text: There are so many shades of each color including sparkles. I highly recommend this product. This is all you need and it will last you a long time. There are so many colors to pick from you could basically match your nails with a months worth of different clothing to color coordinate
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These colors are amazing opaque and creamy. Long lasting and strong for the abuse I put my nails through, it has lasted a whole week so far without lifting or chipping on natural nails.
customer_reviews.author: KSmithWY

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with my purchase! The colors are true to the pictures, they applied lovely, full coverage in 2 coats.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Widener

customer_reviews.title: Takes Forever to Dry
customer_reviews.text: I was not happy with this. It states 30 seconds to dry with a UV lamp and 2 minutes air dry. I had the hair dryer on my hands for about 10 minutes and it still was not dry. I was beyond frustrated at this point that I decided to take it off and use my other nail polish. To take it off, I didn't need nail polish remover. I could literally take it off with a baby wipe and I had no color or polish on my nails. I followed the instructions on the box and it did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa H

customer_reviews.title: Nice mini kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set to have. Some colors have different consistencies some super thick some thinner. Had this set for months, got many uses out if it & still a lot left. Certain colors I NEED in full size! Overall love this kit. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Andreana R

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product! I have wanted gel polish and a uv/led light for a long time. I love these colors and they are very easy and fast to use. I will definitely be purchasing more colors in the future!!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Peels off very easily
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item and within a day it already peeled off. I re did them , peeled off again the next day. Not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Madison Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great set of gel polish for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: Great variety of colors. Easy to apply and cure under UV lamp. Only took about 1 min each coat. I’d recommend this set to anyone looking for good quality gel polish.
customer_reviews.author: F1987

customer_reviews.title: Salon quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Beyond satisfied with this product. The picture is taken after a week of applying the polish. No chip, no peel off, looks great even after a week! Can’t wait to to try out the rest of the colors!
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever.
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I could’ve done for my nails. Regular nail polish never lasts. This product is very easy to use. All you need is a UV/LED light and you’re set.
customer_reviews.author: CurlySuCakes

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This gel nail polish lasted literally 2 days and then peeled off in one big piece. I tried everything- different times on the light, different colors, filing the surface of the nail... no better results. Dont buy this set.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Pessolano

customer_reviews.title: Honest review.. would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: The items online presentation was perfect but as far as the product itself goes, worst gel nAil polish I have ever purchased or used. It never drys, and it becomes extremely clumpy after a hour of waiting for it to dry, after about 2 hours I decided to wipe it off and try again. I honestly DONT recommend spending your money on this product unless you like running nail polish.
customer_reviews.author: Danii1678

customer_reviews.title: Very good starter set or to fill out a collection
customer_reviews.text: I did have a little trouble with this when i first got it, but it was user error. After playing with it, it's great! Great colors, great value! I am just all around happy with this set
customer_reviews.author: Jovonna

customer_reviews.title: Great finish, doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy it is to use - every manicure I did with this set looked awesome - for about 3 days, until it pealed off. On the plus side - I think its less harsh on your nails then the traditional gel nails base/top coats - so if you are looking for a beautiful, easy, finish that looks like a salon manicure and doesn't seem to damage your nails - this is a great choice. Just be prepared that it isn't going to last more then a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Drake

customer_reviews.title: beautiful but, Thought they would be bigger
customer_reviews.text: the box came damaged and the nail polish bottles are sticky on the outside. the nail polish bottles are much smaller than expected (added eraser for comparison). the nail polish can get sticky and tacky if not handled properly . so be careful with cleaning the rim before closing and keeping the polish away from the UV lamp when curing nails. the colors are very beautiful though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply just like regular nail polish. Stayed on about a week (which is great for me, normal nail polish is less than 24 hours). Better than any manicure I have had at the salon. Removes with the foil wrap in acetone. So many pretty colors. Great product for a great price. I use the sensationail light. Take ur time and use very thin layers. 2-3 layers to achieve the right color
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Not the best!
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for these as you get so many polishes. The color is opaque but goes on patchy even with 2-3 coats. Does not cure tacky which was nice especially since rubbing alcohol is so hard to get these days. Polish chipped after a couple days and the top/base coats leaked all over when I got them.
customer_reviews.author: martimar36

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love this set I now never have to go to a salon again the polish is great lasted me about a week without chipping I know a week might not be enough for some people but I work with my hands and put them through a lot but if I didn’t use my hands that much I know it would definitely last more then 3 weeks don’t hesitate to buy just go for it these brand is now my favorite btw gotta thanks missbrice from tiktok who put me on this
customer_reviews.author: Cristy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product !
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. As soon as it was delivered I use the dryer and nail polish. Really can’t say enough about how great the nail polish is. It goes on very smoothly and the color pallet has great colors. I used the nail dryer on my newly painted fingernails and it did not take long for them to dry. Absolutely wonderful product. My nails looked like I went to a manicurist. I highly recommend this nail dryer and the many great colors of nail polish.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Z

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty colors, worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: I love Modelones products in itself. These gel polishes are pretty great for the price. Although they are small, it doesn’t take a lot to get full coverage especially if you prep your nails correctly. Also the colors are VERY VERY pretty. I’ve tried the pastel looking colors (pink, lime green, baby blue, light purple) and I absolutely love them. In the picture below I didn’t use much color as I used it for a design. But still! They’re great.
customer_reviews.author: JSmith

customer_reviews.title: Quality polish and beautiful colors!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first gel nail polish set and it did not disappoint. It offers a great variety of colors and though the bottle seems small, I can tell you I’ve used it several times now and there is still plenty. I liked my first set so much I recently purchased the glitter set from modelones too. I followed all the instructions and my nails truly last 2 weeks. Dont hesitate to buy, great value, and quality products!
customer_reviews.author: Chickasamantha

customer_reviews.title: Old and clumpy
customer_reviews.text: This product was very costly for my budget and when I Tried to use it it was extremely clumpy like it was very old. Because I am a very busy mother of 2 and with a full time job I didn't get to use it right away so by the time I did use it it was too late to return it. I was not very happy with this product and I would not recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Cristy

customer_reviews.title: Would be great if it didn’t arrive damaged.
customer_reviews.text: I was SO EXCITED about this purchase. The colors are gorgeous and I loved the packaging. However, when I opened the box I quickly realized something has opened and spilled. It’s sticky and clear. Also, the bottles are a little smaller than anticipated. I’m pretty disappointed by the spilling though. Not sure where it’s coming from either because it isn’t the polish color. The black on the napkin is from the black velvet box it arrived in.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Good polish for what you pay
customer_reviews.text: I really love the colors in this set! They are slightly different than on the outside of the bottle but nothing too significant. I have been wearing them for 2 days and one nail has pealed off about 1/2 way but I think that is just from user error. I spoke to my mother in law (a licensed cosmetologist) and I buffed my nails too smooth for the base coat to grip to. The polish is a little thick but nothing you can't fix by shaking it for a while. Overall, I think this is a very good deal for the money because there are so many options with all these colors but it is not overwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer McAllister

customer_reviews.title: Value!!
customer_reviews.text: Have always been a fan of this brand for their value and budget friendliness. It’s great to quickly create a large color variety if you like to change your color often (like me). The bottles are tiny but I’ve used the same colors multiple times and the bottle don’t seem to be letting up anytime soon. There are a couple colors that need over 3 coats to be fully opaque, but for this price it’s worth it. I Do wish the brushes in the bottles we a bit nicer/ thinner or had more rounded edges to paint the nails more easily. However with a little patience and practice you will get the cutest mani
customer_reviews.author: Avue

customer_reviews.title: I love it ! Must buy.
customer_reviews.text: These are the most cutest polishes ever. They are like travel size bottles but that doesn’t bother me because when do you ever use a whole bottle of polish? Never ! I love the fact that is came with a base coat and a top coat. So far I am really loving the top coat, it is extremely shiny and I haven’t had any chipping yet. The gel polishes them selves are awesome. Come in beautiful colors and I love them.
customer_reviews.author: sierra williams

customer_reviews.title: LOVE AND LASTS SO LONG!
customer_reviews.text: Omg so where do I start?! Bought this because I wanted to get back to doing my own nails. I wasn't sure about how good the quality would be, or how long it would last. BUT GIRLLLL let me tell you..It's amazing! First off love the colors! And these nail polishes last forever! If you want to stretch your manicure, you can buff out your current gel mani, and paint over it + your new growth, and voila, you get another 2-3 weeks! So I'm a happy customer, will buy another set with different colors soon. Merci pour tout! (FYI I use gelish LED light)
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product, poor quality packaging
customer_reviews.text: I already loved this brand of gel nail polish before I purchase this pack, so I knew I would be happy with the opacity of the polish and the assortment of colors. My only complaint for this set is that the packaging is super flimsy and cheap. The way the bottles are arranged is really visually pleasing, but the actual box the Polish is kept in ripped immediately the first time I opened it. My other Modelones set came in beautiful, Saturday packaging. This one just keeps falling apart every time I open it up. I do love the colors and the application of this product, however.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great instructions and quality polish
customer_reviews.text: I loved this Modelones variety set! The colors are classic but trendy and the instructions made learning to use gel nails realitively easy. These are mini bottles (except for the base and top coat) but the coverage was such that I know I will get a lot of manicures!! A great price for a complete set.
customer_reviews.author: Michele White

customer_reviews.title: Not good nor bad
customer_reviews.text: This is the pic I took after six days of applying the gel. My hair chops out bit by bit during shower and it turns out like this. I did clean my cuticle and buffer the uneven surface like any pre step you get in salon. Pros: color is pretty, no bad flavor, dry normaly under uv lamp. Cons: the brush is too big to handle, chips out soon in the first few days
customer_reviews.author: Amoosa

customer_reviews.title: Durable! Great colors! Fast cure!
customer_reviews.text: I work doing asphalt paving and this picture was taken after two days of hard dirty work. Not one single chip or peel! I like how you only need 30 seconds under the led lamp and only one top coat. Plus after the top coat it’s not tacky like other brands where you have to wipe it with a solution on a cotton pad. The color variety is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: BAILEY BAKER

customer_reviews.title: BUY THEIR BASE/ TOP COAT NOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: Though I could never perfectly use this item, I do love it. It comes with all of the tools and forms you need to have a perfect manicure. What I will rave about and tell all of my gel nail polish friends about is how AWESOME THE TOP AND BASE COAT is!!!!!!!!!! I have been using both regularly (weekly) for about 5 months now and I still have yet to find a better top/base coat. I actually just splurged on buying OPI top/base coat and let me tell you, it DOES NOT compare to the greatness of these two polishes. I wash my hands so many times and will scrub some dishes and their top/base coats hold up!
customer_reviews.author: Hallie Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Very small bottles
customer_reviews.text: So... I have not exactly used these yet, I just received them... however the bottles are much smaller than what I was expecting as you can see it's not even the size of my thumb. I will be doing nails as a side job so I hopefully I can get more than just one use out of a bottle. Will update review Once I have used the product
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great color variety
customer_reviews.text: Got this set yesterday and used them last night for the first time. I did the Taro Milk color and was very happy with how the color came out. I Have the UV lamp and have been doing my own gel nails, so I look forward to trying all the colors. I will say that one nail chipped today, but i think it’s more because I’ve been doing a lot of cleaning around the house combined with the fact that I am still no expert at doing my own gel. Either way I’d definitely recommend for the price. It’s a great variety of colors for someone who likes to change it up often.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Cosio

customer_reviews.title: Great, but fuzz gets everywhere
customer_reviews.text: These colors are beautiful and cure solidly. My issue is with the packaging- the fuzzy inside packaging gets on your hands and, in turn, gets in the paint. That might not be a huge issue with darker colors, but for the light colors, it makes your nails look dirty. If the packaging did not have this fuzzy interior, it would be 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Not Opaque Enough
customer_reviews.text: They are good for the price but not very opaque. I have to put several coats which take longer. I really do like the colors!
customer_reviews.author: Dominique J.

customer_reviews.text: These are really small like really small lol They go on very nice and they look so pretty after you're done curing them with the UV light but they chip in like 2-3 days. I did my nails Sunday morning and by Wednesday they were already chipping. If they were a little bit cheaper I guess they'd be fine. Also the colors are even prettier in person. Just wish they wouldn't chip so fast. :( i ordered another base and top coat ... let's see how they stay one w a different base and top.
customer_reviews.author: Saray

customer_reviews.title: alright. Could be much better
customer_reviews.text: im not gonna lie im a bit disappointed. The colors are gorgeous. But the gel bubbles no matter what I do. Ive never experienced this with any other gel I've used. It can end up pretty lumpy and streaky. I dont feel it self levels very well. Like I said the colors are gorgeous, its just not as smooth as I like.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Marie

customer_reviews.title: Easy, colorful, wearable colors
customer_reviews.text: Love this kit! I used it to do my sister's nails. Very easy to use. The colors are very accurate to the bottle. The small size makes it convenient to try a variety of colors but the only negative is that the tiny bottle handle gave me a hand cramp. Overall, I love it. 2 coats to opaque. Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Gracie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using gel polish I usually do dip powder but these were so easy and I love how the instructions are so clear and easy to follow and u don’t need that much product I only use two thin coats to get the color I wanted I’d you are a beginner this is perfect for you the colors are all so pretty
customer_reviews.author: Mayra A Gil

customer_reviews.title: Way too thin/lacks pigment
customer_reviews.text: Presentation was great so had high hopes when I received this product but it can't even hold a feather to my old polish. It took me three coats to achieve a decent color and that was with one of the brighter better colors, some I don't think would work no matter how many layers you used.
customer_reviews.author: carissa

customer_reviews.title: Get it now!
customer_reviews.text: I love them. Some of them you have to use three coats but they colors amazing. I haven’t used the base and top coat due to me already having a different brand that I want to use up. But I even bought a second kit for my mom since she loved my nails.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Riley

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Genuinely delighted with this kit.They came in a lovely box and the instruction is printed inside the box. So impressed. The colours are very vivid. It went on really smoothly and each layer cured in my led lamp in the recommended 60seconds. Has a great pigment, perfect coverage in 1 or 2 color coats. Exactly what I was expecting. The bottles are glass, not plastic. They are a little small, but certainly not sample size. I have had mine on for a week and had no lifting, no smudging and no chipping. I would buy this again and definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jaycie Slankard

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Has a good assortment of colors, plus it came with a top & base coat. Came nicely packaged & secured in box. No leaks or damaged bottles. The only thing is, wish they were alot bigger but overall I love the product. You only need a thin layer coat & the color is pretty vibrant already, unless it's a lighter color of course. Would definitely buy again, maybe next time different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Daddy Shark

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. There is slight chipping, more so on my fingers than my toes, but to be fair I am kind of rough with my hands. I love all the color choices! Definitely worth the money, I will definitely be purchasing again when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Rogitz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful results!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my step daughter and she was delighted with the results. I was amazed at how beautiful her nails were after using It looked equivalent to professionally done gel nails! I would definitely recommend this kit however, be sure to use a LED lamp when applying.
customer_reviews.author: NDee

customer_reviews.title: Great Colors!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great assortment of colors. I like that each gel polish bottle is the same color as the gel polish inside, makes it easy to quickly identify which color to use. My only complaint would be that these are small but happy with all of the colors!
customer_reviews.author: PrincessJas9

customer_reviews.title: Not happy at all
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what's going on with amazon or modelones I couldn't wait to get my nail polish but I was so disappointed the color chocolate was basically empty I was not expecting that. I have a video but for some reason it is not loading I can email it if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Braswell

customer_reviews.title: Loved my 1st set, so I bought the 2nd one!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 1st set 2months ago, it was too good that I had to buy the 2nd set. It's easy to apply, colors are great and modern. It doesn't peal for 2 weeks (and I'm cooking everyday). That's how great they are. If there is another set with different colors, I would totally buy it too.
customer_reviews.author: Angy

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been doing my own gel manicures for a while and I absolutely love Modelones. These are two of the manicures I’ve done so far :) I bought their base + top coat separately a couple months back so I was really excited when the box came with another full size base + top coat!!!! The colors are super pretty. Looking forward to buying another set after I try all of these colors out!
customer_reviews.author: Ruffina Silva

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but wish there was more.
customer_reviews.text: I love the packaging and that the directions are on the packaging but I didnt think they would be as small as they are. I have not used them yet but hopefully I will have time today to try them and I will update my review when I do.
customer_reviews.author: blackheart308

customer_reviews.title: First gel polish set!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first gel polish set after buying the Modelones gel kit. This set is gorgeous and contains beautiful nudes color. Since this one I also bought the bright colors kit and they are beautiful too!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy
customer_reviews.text: It start peeling off not even a day after applying gel
customer_reviews.author: joey-ann condell

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Obviously I’ll learn over time how to apply it flawlessly (hopefully). But it was easy to use, looks great, and makes me feel great about my nails! Totally recommend. This is only 1 day after application so no comment on how it holds up yet, but for now I’m satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Tiny bottle and needs around 5 coats... colors are pretty though
customer_reviews.text: The bottles are TINY!! They also need like 4 to 5 coats till its a solid color. I just don't think that 30 dollars for tiny colors that you can only use once is worth it:/ the colors are very pretty so I do like that:) The bottles look tiny in the picture but didn't expect it to need around 5 coats:(
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Decent Product
customer_reviews.text: I am not a professional nail technician and this is the first time I have ever applied gel polish to my nails. The polishes are true to color and beautiful. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because the polish color coat dried with wrinkles and high ridges for some reason. Additionally, the polish seems a bit on the thick side. I will update my review if I find things are different the second time I use the polish. For the most part I am happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: JADE

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I’m a beginner and I am in love with this little set. I have four kids so keeping cute nails is not a priority. This is a game changer! My manicure lasts way longer and the colors are so beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy S

customer_reviews.title: Too thick!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little on the thick side. I had to add a few drops of acetone to thin out. I returned the first order and received the 2nd one, hoping that the second set would be less thick, still had the same issue. Maybe the gel polishes are old? But on the positive side, the colors are very pretty! I wouldn’t recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Anabelle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set
customer_reviews.text: Used the red and swatched some others, I love this set. Colors are nice and pigmented. Gelnis easy to use. Love that it comes with the base and top. Love love love.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Gel over regular any day!
customer_reviews.text: Wow this is one of the better gel kits. The polish is high quality. The bottles are mini but I’m ok with that! Gel polish doesn’t take thick layers to build leaving me with more polish. Totally worth it. I will be buying more modelones gel polish
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Beck

customer_reviews.title: Great gel polishes
customer_reviews.text: 16 colors for the price these cost is amazing. They all work exceptionally well, however, there are two colors that were a little weird. The lime green color and the color "classical" peeled and kind of bubbled up immediately after curing them. I'm sure it was just my package only, but I have to mention it. Overall, this was definitely a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Initial Review
customer_reviews.text: Just received this set; product arrived on time which made me very happy. My first impression of the product is “wow”. This set is packaged beautifully. The bottles design is aesthetically pleasing- each color is clearly visible on the outside of the bottle, along with the color name. There are instructions printed on the inside of the box lid. When I receive my lamp to cure the product, I will give a more complete review. But, first impressions are a big deal... and this product really delivers!
customer_reviews.author: Amannda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so umm YES. This is my first time using gel polish on my own and it turned out great! I’m so happy with this purchase and that I have so many colors to pick from. Also such a plus it comes with base and top coat which you really do need. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great and Complete Nail Set
customer_reviews.text: Great set for beginners like me. I’m currently trying to avoid going out ass much as I can so i got this set to get my nails done. It includes everything you need and the colors included are great.
customer_reviews.author: Moogav

customer_reviews.title: Great Product/Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed using this set. The polish worked well over the dip powder nails. I am looking forward to purchasing larger sized bottles. Coverage is great. Two coats work well.
customer_reviews.author: Nichol

customer_reviews.title: Really great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is such a nice gel set for beginners and for people who know what they’re doing. I find the colors vibrant and beautiful. The base and top coat are quite nice as well, though I prefer my base coats to be thicker but it’s nice, and the top coat is nice and shiny!
customer_reviews.author: Albina

customer_reviews.title: Colors Chip Off in 1 day & very translucent
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors however the colors started to chip just after a day. Also the colors are not very opaque and you have to apply 3 coats of this which makes it very thick. The chipping happens so easily. I’m disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Nice but small bottles
customer_reviews.text: Great product , although I wasn’t aware that the bottles would be soooo little . Other than that I like it . The colors are really Nice and pigmented and didn’t take many coats to get full coverage . Pretty nice thick consistency but not too thick as to where it can become clunky.. great product just small in size for the peace rage but I can see myself buying again .
customer_reviews.author: India smith

customer_reviews.title: Great colors!
customer_reviews.text: Colors are even better in person! So pretty and so many different options. Can’t wait to start using them all! Manicure stays on for a very long time. Easy to use and such a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Q Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Cute colors
customer_reviews.text: I like the variety of colors. I don’t like that it peels off easily. You do need a UV light. It feels sort of sticky before drying. You need to have patience with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great price and Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I chose this gel nail set because of the variety of colors it had to offer, and I am so glad I did so. The bottles are smaller than a regular bottle but will still last while, in my opinion. The gel applies very evenly and only requires two coats. I would highly recommend this gel nail set, especially for the great price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: While they are super easy to use, they didnt last all that long for me. Some of the colors bubbled worse than others. And using a ph bonder didnt really prolong the wear. Good for beginners though if you're just trying to get the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: In Love 😍😍💅🏻
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!! Nice colors and very rich with only 2 coats it was very good and I like the idea to have more colors and small mini bottles the top coat is very shiny
customer_reviews.author: Chinita11

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I have my nails done at a salon, but I purchased this set to use in between my appointments (my nail tech has a waiting list!) The first photo was right after I did them, and the second is two weeks later. I was really impressed with how long most of my manicure lasted. I did have to re-do a few of them, but I think I’m learning some tricks to make them last longer. I’m a teacher, so my classroom is tough on my hands. Overall, I’m very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca D.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a while. It was one of my best purchases ever! I am able to do my own nails at home now. All the colors in the kit are beautiful. My daughter and I have been really enjoying it! I have always used it with a LED light. It is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Wei

customer_reviews.title: Love it !!
customer_reviews.text: I love how these come in mini sizes, so I can explore around which each color. I love the wide brushes, it makes painting so much easier. Will purchase again
customer_reviews.author: millie g.

customer_reviews.title: Chips the second day
customer_reviews.text: Honestly don’t waste your money, it chips and peels off like the regular polish. I don’t think this good quality at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sead Sarajlic

customer_reviews.title: Good for a started if you need something fast
customer_reviews.text: I bought these polish over a months ago. I wanted to give them a fair shot. It might just be me but this gel polish crips a lot. Almost instantly. I’ve tried using more base and top coat and I’ve also tried less base and top coat with thinner polish layers and nothing seem to make them last long. Other then that these polish work. I always get compliments when I do them. The color are vibrant and thick.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Looks like I went to the nail salon
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and very good quality gel polish. I wanted to do my nails during quarantine since the nail places were closed and I decided to try this brand. Very happy with my purchase. I enjoyed the variety of colors and base and top coat are great! No lifting or bubbling or uneven polish.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Leiva

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors, however some of them peel and bubble. I use the same UV light, primer, base and top coat that I always use but a couple of colors in this kit don't work as well as others. I have tried those colors more than once, and on my fingers and toes, same issue again and again. The gel polish that does stay on stays very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Model one nails
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed this product it was easy to use. I was able to do my friends and family nails the total process was about 30 mins which much simpler than going to the nail salon. What I like about it is that it does not damage your nails
customer_reviews.author: Kenisha

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!!!! Never going to the nail salon again. Take your time applying the base and first coat of color and the results will be gorgeous. I took these pictures after a week of paining them!!! I did 4 layers of color since I have thin nails and I’m obsessed.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Shafer

customer_reviews.title: I love the polish and the price!! Great value
customer_reviews.text: These polishes are really great for this price! The colors are beautiful and they are very easy to apply evenly. I’m an esthetician so my hands are constantly enduring oils, cleansers, serums etc. and though these do lift slightly after a few days, that’s to be expected with my line of work. I think if you’re someone who isn’t putting your hands through a lot these polishes would be an amazing value for you! The top coat is super shiny too. Honestly at this price I can’t complain.
customer_reviews.author: kasey

customer_reviews.title: It’s good
customer_reviews.text: I like the polish, I wish the bottles were the regular size but when I tried on the polish it turned out beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Reta B.

customer_reviews.title: GET THEM !!
customer_reviews.text: I Loveeeee These Colors 😍. They show up exactly how it looks on the outside of the bottle. Color lasts for a long time and dries fast. Get them! They make doing my nails so much easier! MODELONES is the way to go! Always a satisfied customer 🥰
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: These colors are beautiful! So many options, love that this comes with a base and top coat! Stays on my nails great with no chipping or peeling
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Gel polish
customer_reviews.text: These are mu ultimate favorite brand and colors. I love that all these color are available right then and there. i love how pigmented they are. They last a long time and they don't chip or peel off. with 2 coats you have your color and you dont need to be applying coat after coat to get the color. I've noticed that the more coats I apply the faster they peel off but not with these and thats why I love them
customer_reviews.author: Klaudia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product. This is my first at home gel set and I couldn’t be more happy with the results. If you want a gel manicure that LASTS, wipe your nails down with alcohol prior to applying base coat, apply THIN layers of all polish, and do not let the gel touch your skin as these cause peeling.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste M.

customer_reviews.title: Lasts! Easy! Nice colors!
customer_reviews.text: I love them! They are so easy and I have tried three colors so far and they definitely last two weeks or more. After the two weeks I’m ready for a new color. (Excuse the wood stain on my hand lol)
customer_reviews.author: Marisol Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: Colors were gorgeous and the packaging was great however they don’t dry evenly and when they do dry after hours of trying the peel off the next day. And yea I have a lamp. Also I have a bin I stand my polish in and a few colors that I haven’t even tried to use(so never opened) leaked.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! I shades are very opaque, 2 light coats is just enough to get the exact color! The shade range a great, but there are one or two colors that are a bit similar, but it’s not a big deal! The brush is also very nicely shaped that helps with application. These gel polishes also last at least 3 weeks or more. In love with them!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Koy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the colors and Application.
customer_reviews.text: i am obsessed w these colors and the presentation of this box. make sure you buff your nails a bit then use alcohol to wipe your nails before applying the nail polish. best results are if you apply thin layers (i do about 3). some of the colors take quite a bit of time to get to what you want, but you just have to be patient with it.
customer_reviews.author: Leili

customer_reviews.title: Good starter kit
customer_reviews.text: These are really good gel polished. They don’t peel off and last for up to two weeks on your nails (if done correctly) its a really good starter kid for anyone who is getting into gel nails too.
customer_reviews.author: Nadiade

customer_reviews.title: Polish Review
customer_reviews.text: The picture was taken 2 weeks after my manicure. I love most of the colors. The bottles are small sample sizes and I am checking to see if I can buy full size bottles of the colors I like. Wears like salon colors if you have the equipment to apply it correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good quality, good variety.
customer_reviews.text: There are so many beautiful colors, and they work amazingly and last as long as you expect any gel to last. They work well with top and base coats from different brands too. The only issue I have (which isn’t really that much of an issue anyways) is that some of them aren’t really opaque. But still wonderful for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Eldinab

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using Modelones products for a bit now and I really like them! I think this kit is an AMAZING value and a great way to get introduced to the gel polish world.
customer_reviews.author: Drazzle

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very durable polish. I was sceptical because they weren't that expensive but turned out great. These are smaller bottles but color are nice and long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Illinois

customer_reviews.title: Mostly happy
customer_reviews.text: Only that one of the polishes was open when I received the package and could not be sealed. I had to toss that polish. There is still pink polish that I can’t soak up:( Otheriwise I liked the product and had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Eh?
customer_reviews.text: The colors are pretty.... but I’m not sure if my kit was old, or what happened, but the majority of all the polishes were clumpy and They cured with cracks. On top of that the brushes had random bristles sticking out and that made it impossible to use unless you cut them off yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: i love this product. the bottles are a bit small but you really get enough. ive own mine for almost a year now and i have yet to try all the colors. some are really opeak others you may need a layer or two. so long as you do light coats you will be fine. i jsut wish i could find more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

product_meta.title: Modelones Gel Nail Polish Set,Autumn Nude Pastel Grey Red Blue Pink Gel Polish,10ml Gel Top and Base Coat,16 Colors 6ml Nail Gel Polish,Soak Off Gel Polish Kit for Starters,Home Use Manicure Kit
feature_bullets: ★MODELONES GEL NAIL STARTER KIT: Included in your purchase you will receive 16*6ml mini gel shades, one base coat, and one “no wipe” top coat. Each of the gel colors is highly pigmented, and are easily applied onto your nails for a professional, stylish finish. Suitable for all daily activities such as work, or dates, parties, or ceremonies.
★WELL-SELECTED 16 COLORS GEL: No more struggle to decide which colors should to select, multi-color gel set is to meet your diverse needs. Suitable for 48W lamp.

★BOTTLES SHOW COLORS: These mini, lovely gel color bottles are portable and lightweight, which gives you unparalleled visual enjoyment and the more accurate view to choose the desired color. Your manicure design can be freely finished with these vibrant color gels.

★ELEGANT GIFT FOR FAMILY AND FRIENDS: If you’re looking for a gift for a family member or friend for birthdays, anniversaries, Valentine’s Day or Mother’s Day then this is a decent choice. Well packaged and ready to gift, this is a practical, beautiful gift that will be loved by all who receive it.

★30-DAY MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE: Ensures your satisfaction. If you are not delighted with this gel nail polish set, return it for a 100% refund of your purchase price - no questions asked. MODELONES encourages sharing nail fun.
